Analyte(s): Streptococcus pyogenes (Group A β-hemolytic Streptococcus, Strep A)
Methodologies: Visual detection via lateral flow strip
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Mesa Biotech Accula Strep A Test, a molecular PCR/lateral flow assay for qualitative detection of Group A Streptococcus nucleic acid from throat swabs using the Accula Dock system
Indications for Use Summary: Aids in rapid diagnosis of Group A Streptococcus bacterial infections from throat swabs of patients with signs and symptoms of pharyngitis; negative results require confirmation by bacterial culture and should not be used as the sole basis for treatment
